gate_name: Sprint 1 Quality Gate: Core Auth Stable
criteria: All authentication integration tests passing; User creation E2E flow successful; BCrypt implementation reviewed and approved.
success_metrics: Zero critical bugs in auth flow; Admin can successfully log in and create a new user.

gate_name: Sprint 2 Quality Gate: IPC & Session Security Hardened
criteria: RabbitMQ and Named Pipe integration tests passing, including resiliency tests; Session lock/unlock flow is manually tested and verified; RBAC restrictions confirmed for both Admin and Technician roles.
success_metrics: IPC channels are reliable; Session lock cannot be bypassed; RBAC is enforced correctly.

gate_name: Sprint 3 Quality Gate: Viewer POC Approved
criteria: POC performance benchmarks met or exceeded; POC is stable and without memory leaks; Go/No-Go decision formally documented.
success_metrics: RISK-001 is retired or has a clear, agreed-upon implementation path.

gate_name: Sprint 5 Quality Gate: Data Pipeline Verified
criteria: End-to-end C-STORE integration test (TASK-NET-004) is passing; System Health Dashboard correctly reports simulated failures.
success_metrics: System can ingest data reliably; System can be monitored effectively.
